My guess

At the beginning the fire at the living room should seem controllable, that’s why the daughter didn’t think it’s necessary to leave the apartment.

After letting her father settle in the room, she tried to quench the fire but with no avail. The fire became stronger as time passed and blocked her way out, and eventually killed her.
